ai-atk-s0402a7:1_1: Third: his own Friends and colleagues.
ai-atk-s0402a7:1_3: What is the cause, what is the reason why they dispensation because of that.
ai-atk-s0402a7:2_1: A mendicant isn’t committed to the end of feelings because of each other.
ai-atk-s0402a7:2_2: based on the eighth day, evening.
ai-atk-s0402a7:3_1: Ten conditioned phenomena as conditioned, rooted, and meetsp is conditioned.
ai-atk-s0402a7:3_2: But that conditioned phenomena don’t arise because of that conditioned phenomena, nor does extinguishment come up.
ai-atk-s0402a7:3_3: They don’t ran away when they speak or wish, and they make a fruit.
ai-atk-s0402a7:3_4: That is how they are taught in ten things.
ai-atk-s0402a7:4_0: The third sub-chapter on foundation of exertion is finished.
